archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0846
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to link any IP address back to a user account by way of any IP related identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.value: The IP addresses would be in CDRs. This invormation could be extracted.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
